attributes.additional_details:
There are so many different e-Petitions that all relate to providing cheaper car insurance, alot have been unjustifiably rejected.

If all the e-Petitions that had been created thus far (or are still active atleast) were to be collated, we would see a massive collective of thoughts that are all asking for the same thing to be debated.

So this e-Petition is for all "cheaper car insurance" e-Petitions to be collated together to make one very large, 100,000+ signatory e-Petition.

rejection.details: Does not include a full name
